title: What is this, explain?
comments: 26/11 terrorist did same, they let Muslims go.
Religious hotheads will always find a way to avoid sense.

I don't know what's up with Indian Soap Media. They either just write Muslims' names or just Hindus' names and don't even maintain a pattern. 

Are behenchod sabka naam likh warna mat likh. 

"Junaid and two others" abe kutta billi kauwa chuha Alien kya two others tha be. Ladki ki bare me bhi nhi bata bas bol diya Junaid.

Saale sab Junaid hi hai
Par wo toh Hindu the phir kyu----

Kasab kab se hindu ho gaya? 

Kis jaath ka tha??  

Ruk, Jaath nahi Jhaath insaan tha. Bilkul brainwashed keeda.

He’s talking about the conspiracy to portray Kasab and the rest of the terrorists as Hindus and give 26/11 the name of Saffron Terror. Digvijay Singh came up with the RSS ki saazish to paint the Pakistanis as RSS terrorists. Thankfully Kasab was caught alive

>Saale sab Junaid hi the kya waha pe

two guy, *junaid* stoped the bike, beat up *junaid* . *junaid's* came to know, person they're  beating is from same *junaid* community, then turned to *junaid* who was standing at distance.

Why was this post removed? 

Why are the people of r/india tolerating this censorship nonsense?
Because it doesn't follow the title rules
